summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 15th Avenue North all in the City of Seattle from East Garfield Street to East Howe Street, as laid out in the replat of Lake View Cemetery, by grading and curbing the same providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2262 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
